page.title: 09LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: The{Bung Chapel}was built in 1883 by the Adams family for the workers in the family brewery business. It was built for services but was used for many other things. On January 1st. they dug the foundations of the chapel, on May 2nd. the turret was completed and the chapel was opened and people sang and played instruments in there. If people did not go to the services they lost their job. On the walls of the chapel there are the Adams family initials and two plaques in memory of Thomas Francis{Adams}and his wife Mary. The chapel was re_erected and enlarged in 1902. Now the Bung Chapel will be used as a museum, opening in the Autumn, and all the people will be able to go there to see the exhibits from the Halstead area.
